text: Kare-ra wa `arra wa watashi-tachi ni yakusoku nasa reta. (Dakara) don'na shito mo,(ten kara no) hi de kui tsukusa reru kumotsu o motarasu made wa, kesshite shinjinai.' To iu. Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi izen ni mo, shito-tachi ga meisho to anata gata no motomeru mono o tazusaete kita. Moshi anata gata no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, naze kare-ra (shito-tachi) o satsugai shita no ka
